name: generateOutputPayloadFromContext
xml:
<execute plugin="org.onap.appc.dg.common.JsonDgUtil" method="generateOutputPayloadFromContext">

<!-- this will set output.payload DG Context var with all vars that start with output.payload -->

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="`'Error from generateOutputPayloadFromContext = ' + $output.status.message`" />

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="`'PAYLOAD from generateOutputPayloadFromContext = ' + $output.payload`" />

name: execute Write Config Details for Cvaas
set dcae-error-message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='dcae-error-message' value="Unable to write file to /opt/app/bvc/cvaas" />

name: execute IntermediateMessageSender
xml:
<execute plugin='org.onap.appc.dg.common.IntermediateMessageSender' method='sendMessage' >
<parameter name='code' value="501" />
<parameter name='message' value="`$dcae-error-message`" />
<parameter name='prefix' value="tmp.intermediateerror"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="MSGSENDERERERROR" value="Unable to call IntermediateErrorMessageSender"/>

name: execute saveTxLog
xml:
<execute plugin="org.onap.appc.data.services.node.ConfigResourceNode" method="saveConfigTransactionLog">
<parameter name="messageType" value="log" />
<parameter name="message" value="`'501:' + $dcae-error-message`" />
<parameter name="responsePrefix" value="tmp.saveTxLog" />

name: set payload parameters
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='tmp.config.UPLOAD_CONFIG_ID' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.UPLOAD-CONFIG-ID`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.REQUEST_ID' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.REQUEST-ID`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.ORIGINATOR_ID' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.ORIGINATOR-ID`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.SERVICE-DESCRIPTION`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.ACTION' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.ACTION`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.UPLOAD_TIMESTAMP' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.UPLOAD-TIMESTAMP`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.UPLOAD_DATE' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.UPLOAD-DATE`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.VNF_ID' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.VNF-ID`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.VNF_NAME' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.VNF-NAME`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.VM_NAME' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.VM-NAME`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.VNF_TYPE' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.VNF-TYPE`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.VNFC_TYPE' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.VNFC-TYPE`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.HOST_IP_ADDRESS' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.HOST-IP-ADDRESS`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.CONFIG_INDICATOR' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.CONFIG-INDICATOR`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.PENDING_DELETE' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.PENDING-DELETE`" />
<parameter name='tmp.config.CONTENT' value="`$tmp.uploadConfigInfo.CONTENT`" />
